data.content:
noun
plural -jays
[count] informal :disc jockey
verb
-jays; -jayed; -jaying
informal :to play popular recorded music on the radio or at a party, nightclub, etc., especially as a job :to work as a disc jockey [no obj]
He has deejayed at the radio station for over 20 years. [+ obj]
Who is deejaying your wedding?
